mapper.select: SELECT u.username, u.password, r.id, r.NAME, p.component, p.name, p.path FROM sys_user u JOIN sys_user_role ur ON u.id = ur.user_id JOIN sys_role r ON r.id = ur.role_id JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON r.id = rp.role_id JOIN sys_permission p ON rp.permission_id = p.id WHERE u.username = #{username} limit 1
